message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CL

This paper proposes a new learning framework for image classification and recognition using convolutional neural networks (CNNs). The paper focuses on addressing scalability issues with a large number of target classes and reducing classification errors with a reasonable number of classes. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also introduces an auxiliary block into a neural network, which generates additional information for final classification/recognition, indicating a focus on machine learning and deep learning. Therefore, the other likely sub-categories are cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing), and cs.CL (Computation and Language).
